admin.question: How to add a faculty member?
admin.answer: Go to the 'Add Faculty' section in the Admin Panel, fill in the required details, and submit.

admin.question: How to view faculty details?
admin.answer: Navigate to 'View Faculty' in the Admin Panel to see all registered faculty members.

admin.question: How to manage notifications?
admin.answer: Currently on hold, but in future, you'll be able to send announcements to all users.

faculty.question: How to add marks?
faculty.answer: Go to the 'Add Marks' section, select the subject, class, and year batch, then enter the marks.

faculty.question: How to update marks?
faculty.answer: Go to the 'Update Marks' section, select the student, and modify their marks.

faculty.question: How to check attainment?
faculty.answer: Visit the 'Attainment' page in the Faculty Panel to view the attainment reports.

coordinator.question: How to calculate attainment?
coordinator.answer: Go to the 'Calculate Attainment' page, select the course, and proceed with the calculation.

coordinator.question: How to update marks?
coordinator.answer: If necessary, navigate to the 'Update Marks' section and make required changes.

coordinator.question: How to set course targets?
coordinator.answer: Visit the 'Set Course Target' section and enter the required institute/SPPU-level targets.
